item.title: Redesign
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: It's been a year since the last redesign, right after we were married. I've been sick of the design for many months but was too busy and even when not, I never sat down to do a redesign. Tonight, Gay went to a friend's bachelorette party and I opened a bottle of wine and sat down and just did it. And there it is. Let's see if it can last a year before I get sick of it. To lessen the chance of it getting boring quickly, I can switch out the photo easily and, assuming I have a good photo to use, I will. I hope.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: What a surprise to see this. I liked the old design, but this is a pleasure as well. Your choice of font for the masthead works nicely with the flying buttresses. I hope Gay had as much fun at her bachelorette party.

Drinks, gambling, bar-hopping, music versus Photoshop and a text editor? I think you know who had more fun. ;)
I hope the font looks as good with a photo that lacks flying buttresses. :)
